channel.title: Abouts on Datadog Training Site
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Datadog Training Site

item.title: About the site
item.description: This site was created for the First Annual Datadog Customer Summit in NYC on October 26, 2016 and updated for the second Summit in San Francisco on March 14, 2017. We had about 40 people in the room the first time around and it was very successful. The site is built using Hugo (http://gohugo.io) and Reveal.js (http://lab.hakim.se/reveal-js/#/). To see the source for this site, visit https://github.com/DataDog/summit-training-session and go to the website directory.
